title: Lack of Blue Essence
body:
With the new update rito have removed the earning of BE after games and replaced it with the "level up, get a reward" system. I originally thought this was fine until I hit level 31 (after many games) and received much, much less then I would have with the "old" system. This new system is very unrewarding and it seems that at higher levels we are going to have to start paying RP for new champions '*_shiver runs down spine_*. I would not want to see players leaving because of this fact but it may indeed become a big problem. It would be nice if we could have back the "old" system of earning BE after games but still having a nice little reward for levels. 

This isn't a trashpost to riot but a request for the better of Leagues future. I have been fine with the new runes and find them fun as a supp main. But please make a change for the good :)

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Edit 1 (_The Maths_):
After looking at other boards and asking some friends I have found the **most people are getting around 600BE**. It takes an average of around 10 games to level up (30-31). That is like earning 60 BE per game and this includes first win of the day. 60 BE per game is much less then the old system where 76-145 BE was awarded per game giving an average of 110.5 . Playing ten games with an average of 110.5 gives us 1105BE. When we add the First win of the day bonus it adds to 1255BE. This is double of the new system. This is the soul reason I am annoyed by the update. 

Edit 2 (_Level 32_):
I got three champion shards this time : Warwick, Master Yi and Anivia. This gave a grand total of around 800 BE. A total of on average 400 less BE then the previous update. Even if I am just very unlucky, this luck is not fair for when I grind the same amount as others.

replies.body: From what I understand of the new system, you have a better chance at getting higher "quality" (rather, cost) items from higher levels (you'll get different chances/loot from levels 1-10 than 30-40 or 70-80, for example) and certain milestones (such as every 10 or every 5 levels, and/or "significant" levels like 30 and 50), so it may just be the case that you got unlucky with your loot in this case. It would be a god idea to give the system a chance, rather than assuming it's all around terrible from 1 level when you'll probably be able to hit another 5-10 over the next week or two and be able to get a better idea of what the system is really like.

So what all the lvl 30 players miss out on the rewards from 1-30? just because they grinded before the new system. also i didnt even get my blue essence that i was meant to get from the conversion from ip to BE also with the new lvl up system to earn BE it makes it even harder to buy champions cause we are not earning any BE for playing games we only have a RNG chance to get either a Very Low amount Or a High amount dependent on the luck of the player - Rather than the old system with a garenteed minimum of about 71 i think it was - 120 ip or up to 220 if you had the first win of the day. in my opinion either the rewards from the lvl up system need to be buffed or set or the exp to get to each level needs to be nerfed because i have played about 7-8 games and im still not even lvl 31, so i have earnt no BE for the day which in the old system i would have earnt around 700-1000 ip just for playing.

I completely understand with what you are saying, and i agree I should give it more time. However after hearing what my friends also got from their capsules at the same levels is demoralising. Not only this but most people prefer the system where you get it over time and not just all in one go after a while. I don't think this system is "terrible" I just think that the old one is better and preferred.

It's also worth noting that you won't need as much BE/IP as you did in the past since runes are now free. I haven't played too much yet on the new patch so can't speak to my own experience though. The only thing that has increased in price is the mastery upgrades, which are ultimately cosmetic. You have a choice between a new champion and style points.

the new champion fragments feel bad. They don't refund much, so it feels like you're railroaded into a 'discount' for a reward.

I got a skarner shard from my lvlup capsule, I like skarner, but I was given a choice of 400BE from disenchant or a discount of 600BE. No reroll feature.

I felt railroaded, and even though I shouldn't be unhappy about it, the lack of choice made me feel coerced and cheated. 500BE a day isn't exactly terrible return (though the increasing xp for lvls does draw concern), it's less than before, but it's still a fair amount. 

But getting this as a small lump, and not after each game; and being forced to choose between getting full value or getting what you really want, feels very unrewarding for something I spent the day grinding for.
I agree, not enough essence being given overall.
Out of interest, what DID you get from the level up?

From memory I received: 
Master yi champion shard (below 100 BE)
Karma champion shard (I think 500 BE)

> [{quoted}](name=MTNX,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aIWuZ5XV,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-07T09:39:53.091+0000)
>
> From memory I received: 
> Master yi champion shard (below 100 BE)
> Karma champion shard (I think 500 BE)

So you got a total of 600 BE, right? Level 30 to 31 takes 2500 XP, but almost 600 is given by the first win, so we won't count that since it's free BE. So, 2000 XP for a game, which means approximately 10 games for a level up. So, again, approximately, 60 BE/game.

In the old system you'd get somewhere between 50 to 80 IP/game. 

It's not that bad if you really think about it, also considering that if you're lucky you can unlock a champion you want by using a shard rather than buying it.

the issue is you're railroaded between your own desires and value. Even if it isn't bad mathematically, to the player it feels like coercion. You end up feeling cheated out of something you spent a day grinding for.

Also as xp needed to level up increases, you begin to worry if you'll ever be able to get that next champion, even if you're only a few levels over 30, you still start to worry.

I would personally just like some more consistency with BE as you may like me "get unlucky" and get half what the old ways would have provided. The thought that you basically have to gamble for the amount of ~~IP~~ BE you get is the part of the new system that bugs me.

I understand what you are saying however after doing a bit of research i found that you were awarded 76-145 IP per game which is. It did also take me around 10 games to level up and with the old system i would have got an average of 110.5 BE per game. Which adds up to 1105 BE (double the amount i got) and _not_ including first win of the day which gives from memory around 150 IP/BE. I will admit I may have gotten unlucky and should have given this some more time however getting nearly half the old one is rather sad {{item:3070}} 
Thanks for sharing your thoughts :)

So in other words, it's not even similar for those that only play 1 win a day, and you just don't have to pay for runes.

And your basically forced to get random champions that you can easily get.

From what I have seen so far, it is either you get lucky and get your wanted champion in a shard or grind for a LONG time to unlock them or purchase RP from rito
{{sticker:cass-cry}}
